short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Phzio Screen Sharing allows you to share your desktop or a Chrome tab while in assessments and video conferencing from Phzio.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extend the capabilities of our video assessment tools to share content from your desktop while in a consultation with your clients.
